alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Faulkner; Independence; Jackson; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Perry; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 07 at 2:08AM CST until November 07 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Independence, Jackson, Faulkner, Perry, Polk County Lower Elevations, Central and Eastern Montgomery County, Northern Polk County Higher Elevations, Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations, Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations and Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
